title: (x) Champions of the Faith - Americana {Chesh}
content: Does anyone know this font. I've found similiar, but the "C" is hard to place. Thanks in advance. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125101227im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49407.jpg)
author: lucy23

comments.content: Wow, that was fast. Thanks so much! You all are great.
